description: Comprehensive profiling of a target work's ideas, vocabulary, methodology, metaphors, and framing. Runs three complementary engines in sequence: conceptual framework extraction (vocabulary, methodology, metaphors, framing), semantic constellation mapping (concept relationships and clusters), and inferential commitment mapping (argumentative structure and logical dependencies). Designed for intellectual genealogy but reusable for any deep text profiling.
